Change things from this point onsolum-dashboard===============Horizon plugin for SolumPurpose of this plugin is to add Solum capabilities to the openstack dashboard.This plugin requires a working openstack install including solum and horizon.How to install solum-dashboard into Horizon.--------------------------------------------Enter these commands in your terminal: sudo pip install -e /opt/stack/solum-dashboard cd /opt/stack/horizon/openstack_dashboard/local/enabled ln -s /opt/stack/solum-dashboard/solumdashboard/local/enabled/_50_solum.py _50_solum.py sudo service apache2 restart
